info.title: Locator
info.description: The Locator API provides UPS full-service and self-service locations, hours of operation and pickup times.

parameters.name: transId
parameters.description: An identifier unique to the request. Length 32

parameters.name: transactionSrc
parameters.description: An identifier of the client/source application that is making the request.Length 512

parameters.name: reqOption
parameters.description:
Indicates the type of request.
Valid values:
1-Locations (Drop Locations and Will call locations)
8-All available Additional Services
16-All available Program Types
24-All available Additional Services and Program types
32-All available Retail Locations
40-All available Retail Locations and Additional Services 
48-All available Retail Locations and Program Types 
56-All available Retail Locations, Additional Services and Program Types 
64-Search for UPS Access Point Locations.

requestBody.description: Generate sample code for popular API requests by selecting an example below. To view a full sample request and response, first click "Authorize" and enter your application credentials, then populate the required parameters above and click "Try it out".

oauth2.description:
Find your client_id and client_secret on your app info page.
1. Once your credentials are entered select \"Authorize\" and a bearer token will be generated.
2. Click \"Try it out\" and enter any required values.
3. Select an example request to use or provide your own.
4. Select \"Send the request using the values above\" to execute your API request.

LocationID.description: Location ID is the identification number of the UPS affiliated location.

AllowAllConfidenceLevels.description: Indicator to allow confidence level in search.

SearchOptionCode.description:
Valid values: 
01-Proximity Search Details
02-Address Search Details
03-Proximity Search Summary
04-Address Search Summary
05-Freight Will Call Search. 
Either OptionType 03 or 04 is required.

FreightIndicator.description: FreightIndicator. Required for Freight Location Search.

RequestAction.description:
Indicates the action to be taken by the XML service. 
The only valid value is 'Locator'.

CustomerContext.description: The client uses CustomerContext to synchronize request/response pairs. The client establishes CustomerContext, which can contain any information client want, as long as it is valid XML; it is echoed back by the server

Request_TransactionReference.description: TransactionReference identifies transactions between client and server.

TransactionReference_CustomerContext.description: The client uses CustomerContext to synchronize request/response pairs. The client establishes CustomerContext, which can contain any information client want, as long as it is valid XML; it is echoed back by the server

Request_RequestAction.description:
Indicates the action to be taken by the XML service. 
The only valid value is 'Locator'.

MaximumListSize.description:
If present, indicates the maximum number of locations the client wishes to receive in an address candidate response where the provided origin information is insufficient to accurately establish location. 

Valid values: 1-50, default 10

Latitude.description: The latitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

OriginAddress_Geocode.description: Geocode is the latitude and longitude of the origin address.

Geocode_Latitude.description: The latitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

Geocode_Longitude.description: The longitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

ConsigneeName.description: Name. (Also includes the building name)Return if available.

AddressLine.description: Address Line Information of the UPS location The address level or Intersection information. Only two address lines will be returned. The second line may contain such information as the building name, the suite, and room.

PoliticalDivision3.description: Subdivision within a City.� e.g., a Barrio.

PostcodeExtendedLow.description: 4 Digit postal code extension. Valid for US only.

CountryCode.description: A country or territory code. Valid values to be returned are: US-United States (meaning US 50).

SingleLineAddress.description: Single line search information. Can contain values of origin address in a single line. Will override other origin address information.

OriginAddress_AddressKeyFormat.description:
Contains all of the basic information about the origin such as: Address Lines, City, State/Province, Postal Code and Country or Territory Code. 
The element CountryCode is required.

AddressKeyFormat_ConsigneeName.description: Name. (Also includes the building name)Return if available.

AddressKeyFormat_AddressLine.description: Address Line Information of the UPS location The address level or Intersection information. Only two address lines will be returned. The second line may contain such information as the building name, the suite, and room.

AddressKeyFormat_PoliticalDivision3.description: Subdivision within a City.� e.g., a Barrio.

AddressKeyFormat_PostcodeExtendedLow.description: 4 Digit postal code extension. Valid for US only.

AddressKeyFormat_CountryCode.description: A country or territory code. Valid values to be returned are: US-United States (meaning US 50).

AddressKeyFormat_SingleLineAddress.description: Single line search information. Can contain values of origin address in a single line. Will override other origin address information.

OriginAddress_MaximumListSize.description:
If present, indicates the maximum number of locations the client wishes to receive in an address candidate response where the provided origin information is insufficient to accurately establish location. 

Valid values: 1-50, default 10

Locale.description:
Locale is the 5 digit combination of 2 character language code and 2 character country or territory code separated by an underscore ('_') character. Will be used to determine what language the response will be sent in. 
Default value is: en_US. 
Examples are: fr_CA, es_MX.

LocatorRequest_Translate.description: Contains the locale information for the request.

Translate_Locale.description:
Locale is the 5 digit combination of 2 character language code and 2 character country or territory code separated by an underscore ('_') character. Will be used to determine what language the response will be sent in. 
Default value is: en_US. 
Examples are: fr_CA, es_MX.

Code.description:
The distance unit of measurement code. The unit of measurement used in the search request is returned. 

Valid values: MI-Miles or KM-Kilometers

LocatorRequest_UnitOfMeasurement.description: Distance unit of measurement. This is required for location requests (request option 1).

UnitOfMeasurement_Code.description:
The distance unit of measurement code. The unit of measurement used in the search request is returned. 

Valid values: MI-Miles or KM-Kilometers

LocatorRequest_LocationID.description: Location ID is the identification number of the UPS affiliated location.

MaximumListSize.description: If present, indicates the maximum number of locations the client wishes to receive in response; ranges from 1 to 50 with a default value of 5.

SearchRadius.description:
Defines the maximum radius the user wishes to search for a UPS location. If the user does not specify, the default value is 100 miles. Whole numbers only. 

Valid values are:
5-100 for UnitOfMeasure MI
5-150 for UnitOfMesaure KM

BrexitFilter.description: Brexit Filter. Applicable for country code GB; Pass the PostalCode for the address in the location search if Brexit functionality is desired. UAPs with postal code starts with BT returned when brexit filter starts with BT, else UAPs returned with non BT postal code. Applicable for UAP and Proximal building search.

LocatorRequest_LocationSearchCriteria.description:
The Location search criteria container allows the user to further define the basis to which they wish to receive the UPS locations. 
Only relevant when the user requests a Location search (request option 1).

LocationSearchCriteria_SearchOption.description:
SearchOption contains the information that forms the basis of the location search, It contains the criteria for search by Locations, Retail Locations, Additional Services, or Program Types. 
There should be one container for each type of search the user may wish to do. The user can specify either search by Locations or Retail Locations, but not both. 
If this container is missing, the default search would be for The UPS Store, UPS Center,� UPS Drop Box, and Authorized Shipping Outlet location types.

SearchOption_OptionType.description:
OptionType is a container that indicates the type of search for locations. There are 5 types of search. They are search by: Location, Retail Location, Additional Services, Program Type, and a Service Level Option. 
If search criteria by Location or Retail Location is not provided the default search of The UPS Store, UPS Center, UPS Drop Box, and Authorized Shipping Outlet location types will be performed.

Code.description: The valid list of codes and description for Retail Locations or Additional Services or Pro-gram Types that are currently available in the database. This can be obtained by a separate type of request (Request Option 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48 and 56).

SearchOption_OptionCode.description:
Option code contains the information of a particular Location, Retail Location, Additional Service, Program Type or End Point Service Offering depending on the option type. 
The SearchOptions can contain one or more OptionCodes which forms the criteria for the location search.

OptionCode_Code.description: The valid list of codes and description for Retail Locations or Additional Services or Pro-gram Types that are currently available in the database. This can be obtained by a separate type of request (Request Option 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48 and 56).

Code.description:
Applicable for Additional Services and Program Types. 
Valid values: 
01-And (Default)
02�Or

SearchOption_Relation.description:
The relation container will contain the relation parameter (And/Or) that has to be used among multiple option codes in the location search. 

This is only applicable to option type Additional Services and Program Types. If this container is not present for Additional Services and Program Types, the default relation of And is used.

Relation_Code.description:
Applicable for Additional Services and Program Types. 
Valid values: 
01-And (Default)
02�Or

LocationSearchCriteria_MaximumListSize.description: If present, indicates the maximum number of locations the client wishes to receive in response; ranges from 1 to 50 with a default value of 5.

LocationSearchCriteria_SearchRadius.description:
Defines the maximum radius the user wishes to search for a UPS location. If the user does not specify, the default value is 100 miles. Whole numbers only. 

Valid values are:
5-100 for UnitOfMeasure MI
5-150 for UnitOfMesaure KM

Time.description: Scheduled Local Drop-off Time. Format: HHMM

LocationSearchCriteria_ServiceSearch.description: Allows for users to further define the search criteria. Refer to the rules specified in Service Search section.

ServiceSearch_Time.description: Scheduled Local Drop-off Time. Format: HHMM

Code.description:
Code indicating the different services. Valid values are:
01-Ground.
02-�Air.
03-Express
04-Standard
05-International (Only avialable July 17)

ServiceSearch_ServiceCode.description:
Container that contains the service information such as Ground/Air.
Required if the customer provides ServiceSearch Time.

ServiceCode_Code.description:
Code indicating the different services. Valid values are:
01-Ground.
02-�Air.
03-Express
04-Standard
05-International (Only avialable July 17)

Code.description:
Code that defines the optional service. Valid values:
01�Saturday pickup.
Only valid for air service.

ServiceSearch_ServiceOptionCode.description: Container for the optional service information such as Saturday Pick up.

ServiceOptionCode_Code.description:
Code that defines the optional service. Valid values:
01�Saturday pickup.
Only valid for air service.

FreightWillCallRequestType.description:
Valid values are: 
1 - Postal Code
2 - Delivery SLIC
3 - Delivery City/State.
1: Freight Will Call Search based on Postal Code, this search is valid for Postal code countries. 2: Freight Will Call Search based on SLIC. 3: Freight Will Call Search based on City and/or State. This Search is valid for non-postal code Countries

OriginOrDestination.description:
OriginOrDestination is required for FreightWillCallRequestType 1 and type 3 . Valid values:
01-Origin facilities
02-Destination facilities.

FormatPostalCode.description:
FormatPostalCode would be required in the request when FreightWillCallRequestType is 1. Valid values are:
NFR-No format requested
FR-format requested
FS-format and search
NVR-No validation requested.

DayOfWeekCode.description:
Day Of week Code. Valid Values are 1 to 7. 
1-Sunday
2-Monday 
3-Tuesday 
4-Wednesday
5-Thursday
6-Friday
7-Saturday.

LocationSearchCriteria_FreightWillCallSe.description: Freight Will Call Search Container. Required if SearchOption is '05-Freight Will Call Search'

FreightWillCallSearch_FreightWillCallReq.description:
Valid values are: 
1 - Postal Code
2 - Delivery SLIC
3 - Delivery City/State.
1: Freight Will Call Search based on Postal Code, this search is valid for Postal code countries. 2: Freight Will Call Search based on SLIC. 3: Freight Will Call Search based on City and/or State. This Search is valid for non-postal code Countries

SLIC.description: Facility SLIC. Required for Freight Will call search if FreightWillCallRequestType is 2.

City.description: City. Required for Freight Will call search if FreightWillCallRequestType is 3.

PostalCodePrimaryLow.description: Postal code. Required for Freight Will call search if FreightWillCallRequestType is 1.

PostalCodeExtendedLow.description: 4 Digit postal code extension. Valid for US only.

State.description: State. Required if FrieghtWillCallRequestType is 3 if State is available.

FacilityAddress_SLIC.description: Facility SLIC. Required for Freight Will call search if FreightWillCallRequestType is 2.

FacilityAddress_City.description: City. Required for Freight Will call search if FreightWillCallRequestType is 3.

FacilityAddress_PostalCodePrimaryLow.description: Postal code. Required for Freight Will call search if FreightWillCallRequestType is 1.

FacilityAddress_PostalCodeExtendedLow.description: 4 Digit postal code extension. Valid for US only.

FacilityAddress_State.description: State. Required if FrieghtWillCallRequestType is 3 if State is available.

FreightWillCallSearch_OriginOrDestinatio.description:
OriginOrDestination is required for FreightWillCallRequestType 1 and type 3 . Valid values:
01-Origin facilities
02-Destination facilities.

FreightWillCallSearch_FormatPostalCode.description:
FormatPostalCode would be required in the request when FreightWillCallRequestType is 1. Valid values are:
NFR-No format requested
FR-format requested
FS-format and search
NVR-No validation requested.

FreightWillCallSearch_DayOfWeekCode.description:
Day Of week Code. Valid Values are 1 to 7. 
1-Sunday
2-Monday 
3-Tuesday 
4-Wednesday
5-Thursday
6-Friday
7-Saturday.

PublicAccessPointID.description: The Public Access Point ID to use for UPS Access Point Search. Once this parameter is present , address or geocode search is ignored. It cannot be combined with AccountNumber search parameter.

AccessPointStatus.description:
Status of UPS Access Point. Valid values are: 
01-Active-available
07-Active-unavailable.

AccountNumber.description: The account number to use for UPS Access Point Search in the country or territory. Used to locate a private network for the account. Once this parameter is present any access point address or geocode search is ignored. It cannot be combined with PublicAccessPointID search parameter.

ExactMatchIndicator.description: Presence of this tag represents that "AccessPointSearchByAddress" service is requested. The value of this tag is ignored.

ExistIndicator.description: Presence of this tag represents that "AccessPointAvailability" service is requested. The value of this tag is ignored.

LocationSearchCriteria_AccessPointSearch.description: Applicable for request option 64 only. This contains inclusion and exclusion criteria for address search. It also contains Account Number and Access Point Public ID search elements.

AccessPointSearch_PublicAccessPointID.description: The Public Access Point ID to use for UPS Access Point Search. Once this parameter is present , address or geocode search is ignored. It cannot be combined with AccountNumber search parameter.

AccessPointSearch_AccessPointStatus.description:
Status of UPS Access Point. Valid values are: 
01-Active-available
07-Active-unavailable.

AccessPointSearch_AccountNumber.description: The account number to use for UPS Access Point Search in the country or territory. Used to locate a private network for the account. Once this parameter is present any access point address or geocode search is ignored. It cannot be combined with PublicAccessPointID search parameter.

AccessPointSearch_IncludeCriteria.description: This contains elements to refine (include) UPS Access point address or geocode Search.

MerchantAccountNumber.description: Account number to be used for a private network access point search where a UPS access point candidate list is obtained in search by address or geocode search.

IncludeCriteria_MerchantAccountNumberLis.description: This contains the list of Merchant Account numbers to be used for finding private network access points.

MerchantAccountNumberList_MerchantAccoun.description: Account number to be used for a private network access point search where a UPS access point candidate list is obtained in search by address or geocode search.

DCRIndicator.description: DCR/DCO Availability indicator for UPS Access Point. Either this indicator is present or not present. Presence indicates a search for access points with DCR. Any data in the element is ignored.

ShippingAvailabilityIndicator.description: Shipping Availability indicator for UPS Access Point. Either this indicator is present or not present. Presence indicates a search of access points with shipping availability. Any data in it is ignored.

ShipperPreparationDelay.description: Value for the number of days to check for shipping availability from� the current day. When this value is present, ShippingAvailabilityIndicator is implied implicitly.

ClickAndCollectSortWithDistance.description: This contains the distance (in given UnitOfMeasurement) wherin to sort the click and collect access point locations above other� access point locations� when a UPS Access Point candidate list is obtained in search by address or geocode search.

IncludeCriteria_SearchFilter.description: Container to hold one or more search criteria for UPS Access Points that allow DCR, Shipping and ClickAndCollect access. Only applicable when the UPS access point candidate list is obtained in search by address or geocode search.

SearchFilter_DCRIndicator.description: DCR/DCO Availability indicator for UPS Access Point. Either this indicator is present or not present. Presence indicates a search for access points with DCR. Any data in the element is ignored.

SearchFilter_ShippingAvailabilityIndicat.description: Shipping Availability indicator for UPS Access Point. Either this indicator is present or not present. Presence indicates a search of access points with shipping availability. Any data in it is ignored.

SearchFilter_ShipperPreparationDelay.description: Value for the number of days to check for shipping availability from� the current day. When this value is present, ShippingAvailabilityIndicator is implied implicitly.

SearchFilter_ClickAndCollectSortWithDist.description: This contains the distance (in given UnitOfMeasurement) wherin to sort the click and collect access point locations above other� access point locations� when a UPS Access Point candidate list is obtained in search by address or geocode search.

IncludeCriteria_ServiceOfferingList.description: Container to hold end point service offering List for UPS Access point.�� Applicable only when a UPS Access Point candidate list is obtained in search by address or geocode search.

Code.description:
The valid values are: 
001-Direct To Retail
002-Not In One ADL
003-Click and Collect
004-Retail to Retail
005-Pickup
006-Drop Off
007-PUDO
008-Early Pickup Delivery Time
009-Accept prepaid drop offs
010-DCO DCR intercept accepted 
011-Accepts Payments 
012-Pay At Store
013-Accepts Restricted Articles

Description.description: Description of the service offering. Text will be displayed in the locale requested.

ServiceOfferingList_ServiceOffering.description: Container to hold the end point service offering code and description.

ServiceOffering_Code.description:
The valid values are: 
001-Direct To Retail
002-Not In One ADL
003-Click and Collect
004-Retail to Retail
005-Pickup
006-Drop Off
007-PUDO
008-Early Pickup Delivery Time
009-Accept prepaid drop offs
010-DCO DCR intercept accepted 
011-Accepts Payments 
012-Pay At Store
013-Accepts Restricted Articles

BusinessClassificationCode.description: This contains the business classification code to exclude from UPS Access Point Search by address or geocode. Multiple codes can are possible in separate elements. Please refer to Appendix D for detailed business codes.

BusinessName.description: This contains the business name to exclude from UPS Access Point Search by address or geocode. Partial names are accepted.

Radius.description: Public Access points within Radius (in specified Unit of Measure) of any included private access points will be excluded from the results. Valid only if at least one IncludeCriteria/MerchantAccountNumber is provided.

AccessPointSearch_ExcludeFromResult.description: This contains elements to exclude from UPS Access Point address or geocode search.

ExcludeFromResult_BusinessClassification.description: This contains the business classification code to exclude from UPS Access Point Search by address or geocode. Multiple codes can are possible in separate elements. Please refer to Appendix D for detailed business codes.

ExcludeFromResult_BusinessName.description: This contains the business name to exclude from UPS Access Point Search by address or geocode. Partial names are accepted.

ExcludeFromResult_Radius.description: Public Access points within Radius (in specified Unit of Measure) of any included private access points will be excluded from the results. Valid only if at least one IncludeCriteria/MerchantAccountNumber is provided.

ExcludeFromResult_PostalCodeList.description: Container to hold a list of postal codes to exclude from the access point address or geocode search.

PostalCodeList_PostalCode.description: Container to hold the postal code .

AccessPointSearch_ExactMatchIndicator.description: Presence of this tag represents that "AccessPointSearchByAddress" service is requested. The value of this tag is ignored.

AccessPointSearch_ExistIndicator.description: Presence of this tag represents that "AccessPointAvailability" service is requested. The value of this tag is ignored.

DayOfWeekCode.description:
Day Of week Code.
Valid values:
1-Sunday
2-Monday
3-Tuesday
4-Wednesday
5-Thursday
6-Friday
7-Saturday

LocationSearchCriteria_OpenTimeCriteria.description: Container to hold open times of the Location.

OpenTimeCriteria_DayOfWeekCode.description:
Day Of week Code.
Valid values:
1-Sunday
2-Monday
3-Tuesday
4-Wednesday
5-Thursday
6-Friday
7-Saturday

LocationSearchCriteria_BrexitFilter.description: Brexit Filter. Applicable for country code GB; Pass the PostalCode for the address in the location search if Brexit functionality is desired. UAPs with postal code starts with BT returned when brexit filter starts with BT, else UAPs returned with non BT postal code. Applicable for UAP and Proximal building search.

SortType.description:
For different sort type. Valid values:
01-Closest Location
02-Deadline for Drop-off by Air/Express
03-Deadline for Drop-off by Ground/Standard
04-Latest Close Time
05-Earliest Open Time.

SortCriteria_SortType.description:
For different sort type. Valid values:
01-Closest Location
02-Deadline for Drop-off by Air/Express
03-Deadline for Drop-off by Ground/Standard
04-Latest Close Time
05-Earliest Open Time.

LocatorRequest_AllowAllConfidenceLevels.description: Indicator to allow confidence level in search.

LocatorRequest_SearchOptionCode.description:
Valid values: 
01-Proximity Search Details
02-Address Search Details
03-Proximity Search Summary
04-Address Search Summary
05-Freight Will Call Search. 
Either OptionType 03 or 04 is required.

ServiceCode.description:
Service Code. Required if ServiceGeoUnit Container present. 
Valid value is� '096' .

GeoPoliticalUnit.description:
GeoPoliticalUnit. Required if ServiceGeoUnit container present.
Valid value� is '002' .

LocatorRequest_ServiceGeoUnit.description: ServiceGeoUnit Container. Required to search for the freight facility information

ServiceGeoUnit_ServiceCode.description:
Service Code. Required if ServiceGeoUnit Container present. 
Valid value is� '096' .

ServiceGeoUnit_GeoPoliticalUnit.description:
GeoPoliticalUnit. Required if ServiceGeoUnit container present.
Valid value� is '002' .

LocatorRequest_FreightIndicator.description: FreightIndicator. Required for Freight Location Search.

AllowAllConfidenceLevels.description:
Confidence level.
Valid values: True or False

ResponseStatusCode.description:
Identifies the success or failure of the interchange. 
1-Success
0-Failure

CustomerContext.description: The client uses CustomerContext to synchronize request/response pairs. The client establishes CustomerContext, which can contain any information client want, as long as it is valid XML; it is echoed back by the server

XpciVersion.description:
Identifies the version of the message. 
Current version is 1.0014

Response_TransactionReference.description: Container for customer provided data and the XPCI Version.

CustomerContext.description: Customer provided data. May be XML. If this data is present in the request, it is echoed back to the customer.

TransactionReference_XpciVersion.description:
Identifies the version of the message. 
Current version is 1.0014

Response_ResponseStatusCode.description:
Identifies the success or failure of the interchange. 
1-Success
0-Failure

ErrorSeverity.description:
Describes the severity of the error. 
For additional information, refer to Locator Error Codes in the Appendix.

ErrorCode.description:
A numeric value that describes the error. Each tool defines a range of error codes. 
For additional information, refer to Locator Error Codes in the Appendix.

MinimumRetrySeconds.description:
Number of seconds to wait until retry. 

This field is populated on special conditions of the Transient Error only, as defined by the service.

A number between 1 and 86400 (24 hours)

ErrorDigest.description: The contents of the element in error.

Response_Error.description: If an error is encountered during the interchange, the Response contains an error. If the error is present, then the ErrorSeverity and ErrorCode are required.

Error_ErrorSeverity.description:
Describes the severity of the error. 
For additional information, refer to Locator Error Codes in the Appendix.

Error_ErrorCode.description:
A numeric value that describes the error. Each tool defines a range of error codes. 
For additional information, refer to Locator Error Codes in the Appendix.

Error_MinimumRetrySeconds.description:
Number of seconds to wait until retry. 

This field is populated on special conditions of the Transient Error only, as defined by the service.

A number between 1 and 86400 (24 hours)

ErrorLocationElementName.description: The Xpath name of the element in error. This is a valid Xpath pointing to an element in the request document.

ErrorLocationAttributeName.description: The name of the attribute in error. This is the name of the attribute contained by the Error Location element.

ErrorLocation_ErrorLocationElementName.description: The Xpath name of the element in error. This is a valid Xpath pointing to an element in the request document.

ErrorLocation_ErrorLocationAttributeName.description: The name of the attribute in error. This is the name of the attribute contained by the Error Location element.

Error_ErrorDigest.description: The contents of the element in error.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

LocatorResponse_Geocode.description: Geocode is the latitude and longitude of the origin address. The Geocode is provided in the first successful response. Required to be returned when the origin address or phone number is submitted in the request.Will not be returned when the  requestoption =64

Disclaimer.description:
Disclaimer. In the event the user requested Ground and Air service types and the maximum UPS locations list size has not been met, the list of locations will continue with locations that provide either ground or air within the search radius. 

The disclaimer will note this deviation from the requested search criteria. The disclaimer is also the location where the user will receive information regarding a one-time pickup option if the first location is greater than 20 miles from the origin.

ActiveAvailableAccessPointIndicator.description:
Indicates whether the country or territory has AccessPoints or not. 

This tag is populated in the Response only if tag "ExistIndicator" was present in the Locator request.

LandmarkName.description: If a Landmark code was provided in the request, a candidate list of Landmark Names will be returned along with the corresponding address and Geocode.

SearchResults_GeocodeCandidate.description: If the origin address provided in the location request document does not have a match, a list of candidate addresses, geocodes and optionally a landmark will be returned.

ConsigneeName.description: Name. (Also includes the building name)Return if available.

AddressLine.description: Address Line Information of the UPS location The address level or Intersection information. Only two address lines will be returned. The second line may contain such information as the building name, the suite, and room.

PoliticalDivision3.description: Subdivision within a City.� e.g., a Barrio.

PostcodeExtendedLow.description: 4 Digit postal code extension. Valid for US only.

CountryCode.description: A country or territory code. Valid values to be returned are: US-United States (meaning US 50).

GeocodeCandidate_AddressKeyFormat.description: Contains all of the basic information about candidate address.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

GeocodeCandidate_Geocode.description: Geocode is the latitude and longitude of the origin candidate.

GeocodeCandidate_LandmarkName.description: If a Landmark code was provided in the request, a candidate list of Landmark Names will be returned along with the corresponding address and Geocode.

SearchResults_Disclaimer.description:
Disclaimer. In the event the user requested Ground and Air service types and the maximum UPS locations list size has not been met, the list of locations will continue with locations that provide either ground or air within the search radius. 

The disclaimer will note this deviation from the requested search criteria. The disclaimer is also the location where the user will receive information regarding a one-time pickup option if the first location is greater than 20 miles from the origin.

LocationID.description: The location ID that corresponds to the UPS location. Do not expose the Location ID.

OriginOrDestination.description:
OriginOrDestination will returned for FreightWillCallRequestType 1 Postal based and 3 City and/or State based search. 

OriginOrDestination will be 01 for origin facilities and 02 for Destination facilities

PhoneNumber.description:
The UPS locations Phone number.� A phone number of the location will be returned.� 
10 digits allowed for US, otherwise 1..15 digits allowed. 
The phone number will be returned as a string.

FaxNumber.description:
The UPS location's Fax number. A fax number of the location will be returned when available. 
10 digits allowed for US, otherwise 1..15 digits allowed.
The fax number will be returned as string.

EMailAddress.description: Email address of the UPS location. Returned when available.

LatestGroundDropOffTime.description:
The latest ground time the users can Drop-off the package at the location to be picked up. The time information is based on the time at the UPS location. 
When a user specifies a Drop-off Time and Ground as the Service Type, the locations that have latest Drop-off times equal to or later than the specified Drop-off time and service type are returned.

LatestAirDropOffTime.description:
The latest airtime the users can Drop-off the package at the location to be picked up. The time information is based on the time at the UPS location. 
When a user specifies a Drop-off Time and Air as the Service Type, the locations that have latest Drop-off times equal to or later than the specified Drop-off time and service type are returned.

AdditionalChargeIndicator.description: Presence or Absence Indicator. If present, Indicates if the UPS location would have an additional charge. ASO locations will require an additional charge.

StandardHoursOfOperation.description: The standard hours of operation of the drop location will be returned when available. The location's time may differ because of holidays.

NonStandardHoursOfOperation.description: The non-standard hours of operation of the drop location. The location's time may differ because of holidays, weekends, or other factors that are beyond the locations control. Seven days preceding a given holiday the Non Standard Hours Of Operation will be returned along with the standard hours of operation if available.

WillCallHoursOfOperation.description: The will call hours of operation of the drop location will be returned when available. The location's time may differ because of holidays.

Number.description: The center number of the drop location if it is The UPS store.

HomePageURL.description: The home page URL of the drop location if it is The UPS store.

Comments.description: Comments returned about the location. Text will be displayed in English or the locale given in the request. If Country Code is FR, and locale passed in the request is �fr_FR� then text will be displayed in French language, else comment will be displayed in English language.

Disclaimer.description: Textual disclaimer about the drop location.

DisplayPhoneNumberIndicator.description:
Valid Values: 
0-Do not display phone number
1-Display phone number. 
This indicator will be returned only for the contact type Telephone number. This indicator is used by the clients to determine whether to display the telephone number to the end user.

PromotionalLinkURL.description: Promotional link URL for specific location.

FeaturedRank.description:
Feature Ranking values:
Null or blank - Location is not featured. 
1 - Featured Location ranked number 1.
2 - Featured Location ranked number 2.

WillCallLocationIndicator.description:
Will Call Location Indicator values:
Y � Signifies a Will Call location that serves the customers address. 
N - Signifies it is not a Will Call location.
Will Call locations are only returned with a "Y" indicator if the request included EnhancedSearchOption code 10.

SearchResults_DropLocation.description: When a location request is submitted with a valid origin address, UPS locations will be returned.

DropLocation_LocationID.description: The location ID that corresponds to the UPS location. Do not expose the Location ID.

DropLocation_OriginOrDestination.description:
OriginOrDestination will returned for FreightWillCallRequestType 1 Postal based and 3 City and/or State based search. 

OriginOrDestination will be 01 for origin facilities and 02 for Destination facilities

PhraseID.description:
Contains the name of the IVR file that relates to this drop location. The file is an audio recording of information related to the location.
ONLY FOR IVR.

TextToSpeechIndicator.description:
Indicates to the response recipient that the information has changed, and a new audio file should be produced. 
ONLY FOR IVR.

DropLocation_IVR.description:
Integrated Voice Response information. 
ONLY FOR IVR.

IVR_PhraseID.description:
Contains the name of the IVR file that relates to this drop location. The file is an audio recording of information related to the location.
ONLY FOR IVR.

IVR_TextToSpeechIndicator.description:
Indicates to the response recipient that the information has changed, and a new audio file should be produced. 
ONLY FOR IVR.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the location address or the center point of the area code.

DropLocation_Geocode.description: Geocode is the latitude and longitude of the location address. The Geocode for the location address will be returned when Location is requested in the Request Option.

ConsigneeName.description: Name. (Also includes the building name)Return if available.

AddressLine.description: Address Line Information of the UPS location The address level or Intersection information. Only two address lines will be returned. The second line may contain such information as the building name, the suite, and room.

PoliticalDivision3.description: Subdivision within a City.� e.g., a Barrio.

PostcodeExtendedLow.description: 4 Digit postal code extension. Valid for US only.

CountryCode.description: A country or territory code. Valid values to be returned are: US-United States (meaning US 50).

DropLocation_AddressKeyFormat.description: Contains all of the basic information about a location, Consignee Name, Building Name, Address Lines, City, State/Province, Postal Code and Country or Terriotry Code.

DropLocation_PhoneNumber.description:
The UPS locations Phone number.� A phone number of the location will be returned.� 
10 digits allowed for US, otherwise 1..15 digits allowed. 
The phone number will be returned as a string.

DropLocation_FaxNumber.description:
The UPS location's Fax number. A fax number of the location will be returned when available. 
10 digits allowed for US, otherwise 1..15 digits allowed.
The fax number will be returned as string.

DropLocation_EMailAddress.description: Email address of the UPS location. Returned when available.

DropLocation_LocationAttribute.description: LocationAttribute is a container that contains the information about the location�s Location Type, Retail Location Type, Additional Services, or Program Type.

Description.description: Description for Option type such as RetailLocation, AdditionalServices and ProgramType.

LocationAttribute_OptionType.description:
OptionType is a container that indicates the type of the location attribute. 
There are 4 types of attributes. 
They are: Location, Retail Location, Additional Services and Program Type.

OptionType_Description.description: Description for Option type such as RetailLocation, AdditionalServices and ProgramType.

Code.description: The valid list of codes and description for Retail Locations or Additional Services or Pro-gram Types that are currently available in the database. This can be obtained by a separate type of request (Request Option 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48 and 56).

Description.description: Description is only applicable for Program types and Additional Services. It is not provided with Location detail. It is only provided when the request is for All available additional ser-vices or all available Program types. Text will be displayed in the locale requested.

Name.description: Name will indicate the name of Location/Retail Location or Additional Services or Program Types depending on the option code. Text will be displayed in the locale requested.

LocationAttribute_OptionCode.description:
Option code is a container that contains the information of a particular type of Location or retail location or additional service or program type that the drop location contains. 
If the OptionType is Location or Retail Location Type there will be one code since each location has only one location type or retail location type. 
If the Option type is additional services or program types there can be one or more option codes.

OptionCode_Description.description: Description is only applicable for Program types and Additional Services. It is not provided with Location detail. It is only provided when the request is for All available additional ser-vices or all available Program types. Text will be displayed in the locale requested.

OptionCode_Name.description: Name will indicate the name of Location/Retail Location or Additional Services or Program Types depending on the option code. Text will be displayed in the locale requested.

OptionCode_TransportationPickUpSchedule.description: Container to hold information regarding pickup details for each day of the week.

DayOfWeek.description:
Day of the week for scheduled pickup. Valid values are: 
1-Sunday
2-Monday
3-Tuesday
4-Wednesday
5-Thursday
6-Friday
7-Saturday.

TransportationPickUpSchedule_PickUp.description: Container to hold information regarding pickup day of the week and details.

PickUp_DayOfWeek.description:
Day of the week for scheduled pickup. Valid values are: 
1-Sunday
2-Monday
3-Tuesday
4-Wednesday
5-Thursday
6-Friday
7-Saturday.

PickUpTime.description: Time of pickup in military format (HHMM) e.g. 0930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

NoPickUpIndicator.description:
Indicates whether or not there is a pickup time for the specified day of the week. Valid values: 
True-there is a pickup time
False-there is not a pickup time.

PickUp_PickUpDetails.description: Container to hold information regarding pickup time and pickup availability indicator.

PickUpDetails_PickUpTime.description: Time of pickup in military format (HHMM) e.g. 0930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

PickUpDetails_NoPickUpIndicator.description:
Indicates whether or not there is a pickup time for the specified day of the week. Valid values: 
True-there is a pickup time
False-there is not a pickup time.

Value.description: The straight line distance from the origin to the UPS location. Distance value may include one decimal and followed by one decimal place.

DropLocation_Distance.description: Container for the straight line distance from the origin to the UPS location.

Distance_Value.description: The straight line distance from the origin to the UPS location. Distance value may include one decimal and followed by one decimal place.

Code.description:
The distance unit of measurement code. The unit of measurement used in the search request is returned. 

Valid values: MI-Miles or KM-Kilometers

Description.description: May return the description of the unit of measure specified in the request.

Distance_UnitOfMeasurement.description: The unit of measurement the user will see for the distance is based on the user input provided in the search request.

UnitOfMeasurement_Description.description: May return the description of the unit of measure specified in the request.

DropLocation_LatestGroundDropOffTime.description:
The latest ground time the users can Drop-off the package at the location to be picked up. The time information is based on the time at the UPS location. 
When a user specifies a Drop-off Time and Ground as the Service Type, the locations that have latest Drop-off times equal to or later than the specified Drop-off time and service type are returned.

DropLocation_LatestAirDropOffTime.description:
The latest airtime the users can Drop-off the package at the location to be picked up. The time information is based on the time at the UPS location. 
When a user specifies a Drop-off Time and Air as the Service Type, the locations that have latest Drop-off times equal to or later than the specified Drop-off time and service type are returned.

DropLocation_AdditionalChargeIndicator.description: Presence or Absence Indicator. If present, Indicates if the UPS location would have an additional charge. ASO locations will require an additional charge.

DropLocation_StandardHoursOfOperation.description: The standard hours of operation of the drop location will be returned when available. The location's time may differ because of holidays.

DropLocation_NonStandardHoursOfOperation.description: The non-standard hours of operation of the drop location. The location's time may differ because of holidays, weekends, or other factors that are beyond the locations control. Seven days preceding a given holiday the Non Standard Hours Of Operation will be returned along with the standard hours of operation if available.

DropLocation_WillCallHoursOfOperation.description: The will call hours of operation of the drop location will be returned when available. The location's time may differ because of holidays.

DropLocation_Number.description: The center number of the drop location if it is The UPS store.

DropLocation_HomePageURL.description: The home page URL of the drop location if it is The UPS store.

DropLocation_Comments.description: Comments returned about the location. Text will be displayed in English or the locale given in the request. If Country Code is FR, and locale passed in the request is �fr_FR� then text will be displayed in French language, else comment will be displayed in English language.

DropLocation_AdditionalComments.description: Container for Additional Comments about Location.Text will be displayed in the Locale requested.

Code.description: Comment code is 01 for AccessPoint LCO pickup time comment.

Text.description: Access point LCO pickup time comment

AdditionalComments_CommentType.description: Container for CommentType Code and Text.

CommentType_Code.description: Comment code is 01 for AccessPoint LCO pickup time comment.

CommentType_Text.description: Access point LCO pickup time comment

DropLocation_Disclaimer.description: Textual disclaimer about the drop location.

HoursType.description:
Hours Type. 

Valid values: 
10-Regular Operating Hours 
11-Will Call Hours
12-Same Day Will Call Hours
14-Customer PickUp
50-Drop Off Hours 
51-Prep Hours

StandardHours_HoursType.description:
Hours Type. 

Valid values: 
10-Regular Operating Hours 
11-Will Call Hours
12-Same Day Will Call Hours
14-Customer PickUp
50-Drop Off Hours 
51-Prep Hours

OpenHours.description: Open time of a location in military format (HHMM) e.g. 930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

CloseHours.description: Close time of a location in military format (HHMM) e.g. 930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

LatestDropOffHours.description: LatestDropOffHours for Hour Type 50. Latest Drop Off time of a location in military format (HHMM) e.g. 930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

PrepHours.description: PrepHours for Hour Type 51. Prep Hours of a location in military format (HHMM) e.g. 930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

ClosedIndicator.description: Presence absence Indicator. Indicator present means location is closed.

Open24HoursIndicator.description: Presence/ Absence Indicator. Presence denotes  for the given day, if the location is open 24 hours. Absence denotes the location is not open for 24 hours on the given day.

StandardHours_DayOfWeek.description: Container for the Day of Week.

DayOfWeek_OpenHours.description: Open time of a location in military format (HHMM) e.g. 930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

DayOfWeek_CloseHours.description: Close time of a location in military format (HHMM) e.g. 930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

DayOfWeek_LatestDropOffHours.description: LatestDropOffHours for Hour Type 50. Latest Drop Off time of a location in military format (HHMM) e.g. 930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

DayOfWeek_PrepHours.description: PrepHours for Hour Type 51. Prep Hours of a location in military format (HHMM) e.g. 930, 1700, 1845 etc. with exception for midnight. For midnight the time will be returned as 0.

DayOfWeek_ClosedIndicator.description: Presence absence Indicator. Indicator present means location is closed.

DayOfWeek_Open24HoursIndicator.description: Presence/ Absence Indicator. Presence denotes  for the given day, if the location is open 24 hours. Absence denotes the location is not open for 24 hours on the given day.

Last50ftInstruction.description: Holds the additional instructions. Text will be displayed in English or the locale given in the request. The max length of the additional instruction text is 750 characters.

LocalizedInstruction_Last50ftInstruction.description: Holds the additional instructions. Text will be displayed in English or the locale given in the request. The max length of the additional instruction text is 750 characters.

Locale.description: Locale (language/ dialect) for the promotion code.

Promotion.description: Promotion text for the given location.

DropLocation_PromotionInformation.description: Container to hold any promotion text for the location. Text will be displayed in English or the locale given in the request

PromotionInformation_Locale.description: Locale (language/ dialect) for the promotion code.

PromotionInformation_Promotion.description: Promotion text for the given location.

HubSortCode.description: Holds the value of the hub sort code or airport code

FreightSortFacilityCode.description: Holds the value of the facility location code.

DropLocation_SortCode.description: This container is only for Freight Will call Search.

SortCode_HubSortCode.description: Holds the value of the hub sort code or airport code

SortCode_FreightSortFacilityCode.description: Holds the value of the facility location code.

DropLocation_ServiceOfferingList.description: Container to hold the list of service offerings at the end point.

ServiceOffering_Description.description: Description of the service offering. Text will be displayed in the locale requested.

DropLocation_DisplayPhoneNumberIndicator.description:
Valid Values: 
0-Do not display phone number
1-Display phone number. 
This indicator will be returned only for the contact type Telephone number. This indicator is used by the clients to determine whether to display the telephone number to the end user.

PublicAccessPointID.description: The Public Access Point ID associated with UPS access point.

ImageURL.description: Image URL associated with UPS access point.

FacilitySLIC.description: Holds the value of facility SLIC of Access Point Location. Not implemented currently. For future use.

DropLocation_AccessPointInformation.description: Container for UPS Access Point specific parameters.

AccessPointInformation_PublicAccessPoint.description: The Public Access Point ID associated with UPS access point.

AccessPointInformation_ImageURL.description: Image URL associated with UPS access point.

AccessPointInformation_BusinessClassific.description: Container to hold list for business classification.

Code.description: Business Classification code of UPS Access Point. Please refer to appendix D for a list of business classification.

BusinessClassificationList_BusinessClass.description: Container to hold Business classification of UPS access point.

BusinessClassification_Code.description: Business Classification code of UPS Access Point. Please refer to appendix D for a list of business classification.

AccessPointInformation_FacilitySLIC.description: Holds the value of facility SLIC of Access Point Location. Not implemented currently. For future use.

AccessPointInformation_PrivateNetworkLis.description: Container to hold the list of private networks.

PrivateNetworkList_PrivateNetwork.description: Container to hold the private network details.

AccessPointInformation_Availability.description: Container to hold the status of shipping or DRC/DCO availability of a UPS Access Point.

AvailableIndicator.description: Presence or absence indicator. Presence means the location is available for shipping.

ShippingAvailability_AvailableIndicator.description: Presence or absence indicator. Presence means the location is available for shipping.

Code.description:
Code for DCR/DCO� unavailability. Valid values: 
01-Temporarily Unavailable 
02-Location Full
03-Unavailable
04-Weather

ShippingAvailability_UnavailableReason.description: Container to hold shipping unavailable reason.

UnavailableReason_Code.description:
Code for DCR/DCO� unavailability. Valid values: 
01-Temporarily Unavailable 
02-Location Full
03-Unavailable
04-Weather

AvailableIndicator.description: Presence or absence indicator. Presence means the location is available for DCR/DCO.

DCRAvailability_AvailableIndicator.description: Presence or absence indicator. Presence means the location is available for DCR/DCO.

Code.description:
Code for DCR/DCO� unavailability. Valid values: 
01-Temporarily Unavailable 
02-Location Full
03-Unavailable
04-Weather

DCRAvailability_UnavailableReason.description: Container to hold shipping unavailable reason.

NonSecureURL.description: Non Secure URL for Location Image.

LocationImage_NonSecureURL.description: Non Secure URL for Location Image.

DropLocation_PromotionalLinkURL.description: Promotional link URL for specific location.

DropLocation_FeaturedRank.description:
Feature Ranking values:
Null or blank - Location is not featured. 
1 - Featured Location ranked number 1.
2 - Featured Location ranked number 2.

DropLocation_WillCallLocationIndicator.description:
Will Call Location Indicator values:
Y � Signifies a Will Call location that serves the customers address. 
N - Signifies it is not a Will Call location.
Will Call locations are only returned with a "Y" indicator if the request included EnhancedSearchOption code 10.

SearchResults_AvailableLocationAttribute.description: This container contains the information about the currently existing Retail Locations or Additional Services or Program types.

Description.description: Description for Option type such as RetailLocation, AdditionalServices and ProgramType.

AvailableLocationAttributes_OptionType.description: OptionType is a container that indicates the type of the location attribute that are available. For example if the Option Type is RetailLocation the list of all available retail locations will be returned in 1 or many corresponding OptionCodes.

Code.description: The valid list of codes and description for Retail Locations or Additional Services or Pro-gram Types that are currently available in the database. This can be obtained by a separate type of request (Request Option 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48 and 56).

Description.description: Description is only applicable for Program types and Additional Services. It is not provided with Location detail. It is only provided when the request is for All available additional ser-vices or all available Program types. Text will be displayed in the locale requested.

Name.description: Name will indicate the name of Location/Retail Location or Additional Services or Program Types depending on the option code. Text will be displayed in the locale requested.

AvailableLocationAttributes_OptionCode.description: Option code is a container that contains the information of a particular retail location type or additional service or program type that is available currently. One or more of this container will be returned to give all the available codes for Retail Type or Additional Services or Program Type.

SearchResults_ActiveAvailableAccessPoint.description:
Indicates whether the country or territory has AccessPoints or not. 

This tag is populated in the Response only if tag "ExistIndicator" was present in the Locator request.

LocatorResponse_AllowAllConfidenceLevels.description:
Confidence level.
Valid values: True or False
